cards.name: Brand
cards.desc: This five-foot long ardite greatsword has a narrow blade and a hilt of wrought iron wrapped in grey leather. The blade is warm to the touch and shimmers with brilliant red and orange hues.

cards.name: Salamander Flame Gauntlets
cards.desc: These dark metal gauntlets were forged using fire from the heart of a salamander.

cards.name: Nimbus, First Staff of the Thunderbirds
cards.desc: This ancient staff was created when a piece of driftwood was struck by lightning, fusing it to a twisted length of glass made from the sand on which it laid.

cards.name: Direstone Wand
cards.desc: A rigid stone wand used by the arcane dwarves of the Direstone mines.

cards.name: Psionic Crystal
cards.desc: This fist-sized sapphire vibrates and hums with positive psionic charge.

cards.name: Ring of Stoneflesh
cards.desc: This heavy ring is made from polished granite and set with pale red quartz.

cards.name: Scroll of Fireball
cards.desc: A spell scroll bears the words of a single spell, written in a mystical cipher.

cards.name: Potion of Healing
cards.desc: Whatever its potency, the potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.
